name: Overload Bots
description:
- RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN :)

- Overlord bots is a short puzzle platformer created in less than 72 hours for Mini Jam 100.

  • THEME:

- The theme of the jam was "OVERLOAD" so in this game you control 2 robots at the same time and you have to overcome puzzles until you reach your target and overload it to open a metal gigant door and join the two robots.

  • LIMITATION:

- The jam limitation was "chaos is everything", and the chaotic thing about this game is having to move the 2 characters at the same time.

  • 🎮 CONTROLS :

- This game is compatible with keyboard and gamepad (Xbox and PS4).

- In the game, in How to play, you can see the controls of both the keyboard and the gamepad.

Enjoy the game!
